name: Spicy Shrimp and Red Bean Soup
author: Kim Berley
summary: Shrimp, red beans (or kidney), tomatoes with chiles, and cream of mushroom soup make this soup an easy-to-make crowd pleaser that looks and tastes like soup from a fine restaurant. Serve with Garlic Toast to make it a complete meal. I created this completely by accident and it turned out great!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, drained
1 (10 ounce) can tomatoes with green chilies
1 (10 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
12 ounces medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Warm the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat
Stir in the garlic, celery, and green onions
Cook, stirring frequently, until tender, about 3 minutes
Stir in beans, tomatoes, cream of mushroom soup, and water
Stir in dill, reduce heat to medium, and simmer 10 minutes
Stir in shrimp, and simmer until shrimp are pink, about 5 minutes
